Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Well, you must be the god of business.
10,000,000G worth of sales? That's impressive.

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're a great merchant. You've moved over
1,000,000G worth of goods. Not bad at all.

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you've made over 100,000G worth of
sales. Keep it up.

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew, it's been a while since I bought
something good.

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town's a bit out of the way for elderly folks
like me. Not looking forward to the return trip
home...

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I might have bought too much... I spent every G
I had.

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Couldn't find anything I wanted to buy. Maybe I'll
stop by again some other time.

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I tell my wife I didn't buy anything, she might
get a little scary...

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be back later on. Hope I find something good
next time.

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if that stuff I wanted is still here...

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our house's furniture is gettin' creakier than I am.
<PAGE>
So how 'bout it? Any decent furniture 'round
here today?

<NAME_MOB_GUNTHER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, right. My wife said to buy fish and
vegetables too. Almost forgot.
